text:
How do I suggest a new user be invited to this slack channel?
Talking to a developer now who I think would be a good contributor.
pls hit me with <@U2SJA29B4> on reply. thx
Hi there, is there a way to put a HubSpot site like "work in progres"?
Are you looking to put a site in “maintenance mode” or use Content Staging?
Thanks Jeff, we were looking for a maintenance mode but as I see we should use Content Staging for new projects like this
I believe you should be able to invite them, but if not just pass along their email address and I'm happy to add them.
